job-posts.postedJobTitle: Architectual Design, CAD Drawing, and Interior Design Assistant
job-posts.postedJobDescription: Interior Designer looking for design assistant to support on case by case basis. Potential to grow into more regular basis and possible full time next year. Requirement: - familiar with building code requirements - able to research needed information at various city entities - familiar and has copies of AutoCAD and 3D softwares

job-posts.postedJobTitle: Sketchup and Layout Expert for Wood Construction Extension
job-posts.postedJobDescription: We are a company specialized in wood frame house extensions. We look for a partner in first step to: - Draw the current houses on SketchUp thanks to a plan and current houses pictures Then, in step 2 : - Lay the “SketchUp” out by creating the walls and roof thickness - Ad the materials - Ad some objects “enscape” in priority then “3D warehouse” if needed. - Create the “layout” We supply a file with the whole layout instructions. You have to ad the scenes in SketchUp then update the layout and the sides. We handle the insertion of the technical informations. If we are satisfied by your offer, this mission will be regular (about once mission a week).

job-posts.postedJobTitle: 3D Modeling and Rendering for 5000sqft House Interior
job-posts.postedJobDescription: Needs to hire 2 Freelancers We are looking for a skilled 3D artist to create a realistic and high-quality 3D model and renderings of the interior of a 5000sqft house. The deliverables will include a detailed 3D model and photo-realistic renderings that showcase the design and layout of the house. The ideal candidate should have experience in architectural visualization and be proficient in using software such as 3ds Max, SketchUp. Attention to detail and the ability to accurately replicate the materials, textures, and lighting are essential. Good communication skills and the ability to work within deadlines are also required.

job-posts.postedJobTitle: Architect/Interior Designer for Co-working Space Concept Design
job-posts.postedJobDescription: Project Description: We are seeking a skilled Architect or Interior Designer to create a comprehensive layout for a 111m² co-working space. This project is crucial for our feasibility planning phase and aims to develop an engaging, functional, and innovative co-working environment.
I have a client that has real estate and he would to design the interior of his apartment. Please mention any experience you have with examples of apartments you have designed.

Oversee architectural projects from initial concept to completion. Manage budgets, timelines, and ensure client satisfaction while coordinating with team members. Requires strong leadership, communication, and project management skills.

Review architectural plans and specifications for code compliance, ensuring adherence to building safety and accessibility regulations. Requires a deep understanding of building codes and strong analytical skills.

Design and plan stylish and functional kitchens and bathrooms. Consider client needs, space limitations, and budget. Strong knowledge of plumbing fixtures, cabinetry, kitchen appliances, and bathroom layouts is a plus.

Advise clients on color palettes for architectural and interior design projects, considering psychology, space perception, and overall design aesthetic. Requires a keen eye for color and knowledge of color theory.

Design functional and patient-centered healthcare facilities, considering safety, infection control, and user experience. Requires understanding of healthcare regulations and specific needs of different healthcare environments.

Design and develop functional and aesthetically pleasing furniture pieces, considering ergonomics, user needs, and manufacturing feasibility. Creativity, strong design sense, and understanding of furniture construction methods are essential.
